column5: http://cleveland.craigslist.org/stp/1422707481.html  particular or peculiar? LOL if your going to swing? swing for the fence?
...nothin wrong with sayin it like it is...  ...saves a lotta heartache later on...  Some ladies might find it refreshing.

LOL Jer, ya guess I can be brutally honest, plenty of faults of my own and not afraid to admit them, what I am is what I am. No chains on anyone, you don`t like it? No locks on the door, or chains on you.  A passive search for something? Even I am not sure what, LOL kind of like trolling? My run and gun days are over. LOL not afraid of man nor beast, but wimmins can be scary!
No bumpf , no bull. Straight up and honest. The way things should be. Good to see.
